choice.title: tools
choice.description: Binary tools like appledoc and waxsim. These are installed in the home directory inside the .raku folder

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1138 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Raku Templates for XCode 4\ \ This will install Project Templates for building iOS apps with Xcode 4 with the Raku Layout.\ \ It also installs the following tools needed for the templates: \ \ - Appledoc by Gentle Bytes\ - Waxsim by Corey Jonhson (the Square fork)\ - Scan build tool from Clang}
